articles.title: LG Velvet's Dual Screen accessory gets certified - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: It looks like the company isn't ready to give up on the concept.
articles.content: By the accounts of multiple rumors, LG is ready to give up on its G-series this year. Thus, the phone that could have been the G9 is actually what we now know to be called Velvet. The Korean company has been teasing this handset quite a lot recently, with its… [+1103 chars]

articles.title: Oppo A52 goes official with Snapdragon 665 SoC and 5,000mAh battery - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Oppo unveiled the new Oppo A52 through its official website. It's a mid-range smartphone wiht Snapdragon 665 SoC and a 5,000mAh battery in tow.
articles.content: Oppo is on a row during these last days of April. After revealing several smartphones in just a couple of days, the company is adding a new member to the list dubbed Oppo A52. It’s a mid-range smartphone with last year’s Snapdragon 665 SoC and a more than cap… [+1179 chars]
